block.p: GERVINO-Serafino. ''The Maestro.'' Beloved husband of the late Rose. Devoted father of Camille Romita, Armand, Rosemarie Brueckner and the late Kathleen Gervino Beker. Loving grandfather of Carla Romita, Michael N. Romita, Paul Romita, Alexandra Brueckner, and great-grandfather of Katherine. Reposing at Loyd Maxy & Son Beauchamp Chapel, 16 Shea Lane, until Monday, 9 AM. Mass of Christian Burial at the Holy Family Chapel of the College of New Rochelle, Monday, 10 AM. Contributions to the Kathleen Gervino Beker Scholarship Fund at the College of New Rochelle will be appreciated by the family.
